lead_paragraph: One of the highest-stakes races in any Olympic Games is the mad dash to finish building the venues before hundreds of thousands of visitors arrive but 2024 bid city Los Angeles said on Tuesday it had an eight year head-start on the field.

headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Vows 'Risk-Free' Games if Awarded 2024
headline.main: Los Angeles Vows 'Risk-Free' Games if Awarded 2024

snippet: One of the highest-stakes races in any Olympic Games is the mad dash to finish building the venues before hundreds of thousands of visitors arrive but 2024 bid city Los Angeles said on Tuesday it had an eight year head-start on the field....
